predicate.note: Frames file for 'intercede' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

roleset.name: intervene, come between to create a resolution

example.name: these verbs are getting progressively weirder
example.text: Common Cause asked both the Senate Ethics Committee and the Justice Department to investigate $1 million in political gifts by Arizona businessman Charles Keating to five U.S. senators who [*T*-1] interceded with thrift-industry regulators for him.
